chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (l : list op) (t t' : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t -> In (IRU k) t') -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t' -> In (IRU k) t) -> acknowledge_all_ops_func l t = acknowledge_all_ops_func l t'

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
acknowledge_all_ops_func = fix acknowledge_all_ops_func (l : list op) (target : list IR) {struct l} : list IR := match l with | [] => [] | I k :: xs => if acknowledged_op_dec k xs then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target | O k :: xs => IRO k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target end : list op -> list IR -> list IR Arguments acknowledge_all_ops_func (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive IR : Type := IRI : K -> IR | IRO : K -> IR | IRU : K -> IR
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
acknowledge_all_ops_func_defn : forall (x : op) (l : list op) (target : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops_func (x :: l) target = match x with | I k => if acknowledged_op_dec k l then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else acknowledge_all_ops_func l target | O k => IRO k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target end
acknowledge_all_ops_was_in : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) l
IR_ind : forall P : IR -> Prop, (forall k : K, P (IRI k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRO k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRU k)) -> forall i : IR, P i
IR_sind : forall P : IR -> SProp, (forall k : K, P (IRI k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRO k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRU k)) -> forall i : IR, P i
IR_rect : forall P : IR -> Type, (forall k : K, P (IRI k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRO k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRU k)) -> forall i : IR, P i
IR_rec : forall P : IR -> Set, (forall k : K, P (IRI k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRO k)) -> (forall k : K, P (IRU k)) -> forall i : IR, P i
acknowledged_op = fun (k : K) (trace : list op) => In (O k) trace : K -> list op -> Prop Arguments acknowledged_op _ _%list_scope
fast_OMEGA16 : forall (v c l k : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v * (c * k) + l * k)%Z -> P ((v * c + l) * k)%Z
acknowledge_all_ops_sind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) ->...-> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_ind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) ->...-> P l l0
not_in_assoc : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (k : K) (l : list (K * V)), ~ In k (map fst l) -> assoc K_eq_dec l k = None
NoDup_count_occ' : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), NoDup l < -> (forall x : A, In x l -> count_occ decA l x = 1)
in_fold_left_by_cons_in : forall A B : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (l : list B) (g : B -> A) (x : A) (acc : list A), In x (fold_left (fun (a : list A) (b : B) => g b :: a) l acc) -> In x acc \/ (exists y : B, In y l /\ x = g y)
pigeon : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l sub1 sub2 : list A, (forall a : A, In a sub1 -> In a l) -> (forall a : A, In a sub2 -> In a l) -> NoDup l -> NoDup sub1 -> NoDup sub2 -> length sub1 + length sub2 > length l -> exists a : A, In a sub1 /\ In a sub2
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ In a l
collate_ls : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
collate : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> list (?A * ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
subset_length : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall xs ys : list A, NoDup xs -> (forall x : A, In x xs -> In x ys) -> length ys >= length xs
in_remove_all_preserve : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), ~ In x ds -> In x l -> In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l)
fold_left_for_each_in : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (g : A -> B -> C), (forall x y : B, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (forall (a : A) (b b' : B), b <> b' -> g (f a b') b = g a b) -> forall (l : list B) (a : A) (b : B), In b l -> exists a' : A, g (fold_left f l a) b = g (f a' b) b
assoc : forall K V : Type, (forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) -> list (K * V) -> K -> option V
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, (z > 0)%Z -> (t > 0)%Z -> (0 <= x)%Z -> (0 <= y)%Z -> (0 <= x * z + y * t)%Z
filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?rel : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Relation_Definitions.relation ?A]
Build_DiskOpMultiParams : forall (P : BaseParams) (do_name file_name do_msg : Type), (forall x y : do_msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (forall x y : do_name, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (forall x y : file_name, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall do_nodes : list do_name, (forall n : do_name, In n do_nodes) -> NoDup do_nodes -> (do_name -> do_name -> do_msg -> data -> list (disk_op file_name) * list output * data * list (do_name * do_msg)) -> (do_name -> input -> data -> list (disk_op file_name) * list output * data * list (do_name * do_msg)) -> DiskOpMultiParams P
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]

```coq
intros l t t'.
induction l.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. destruct a.
  * rewrite IHl. f_equal. apply functional_extensionality. intros ir. destruct ir.
    ++ rewrite acknowledge_all_ops_defn. destruct (acknowledged_op_dec k l).
       ===> rewrite IHl. f_equal. apply functional_extensionality. intros ir. destruct ir.
    ++ rewrite acknowledge_all_ops_defn. destruct (acknowledged_op_dec k l).
       ===> rewrite IHl. f_equal. apply functional_extensionality. intros ir. destruct ir.
  * rewrite IHl. f_equal. apply functional_extensionality. intros ir. destruct ir.
Qed.
